channel.title: A whole list
channel.description: OK. i took a server from some guy. he said it was ok.. i changed everything BUT i want it to be rare to have phats.. the shop sells them.. so how do i take out shops.. npc drops them.. idk how to take npcs out\ change what they drop.. BIGGER PROBLEM. the shop sells ancient staffs < which i dont know how to take out.. and the ancient staffs hit 99s!! how do i change the stat bonus on ancient staff?? what file do i look in ect.. PLEASE HELP. I know where to look so you dont have to say oooh another noob who doesnt know ****. i just need to know where to look .. some1 please help

item.title: A whole list
item.dc:creator: @Jarbo Jarbo
item.description:
@Jarbo wrote:

OK. i took a server from some guy. he said it was ok… i changed everything BUT i want it to be rare to have phats… the shop sells them… so how do i take out shops… npc drops them… idk how to take npcs out\ change what they drop… BIGGER PROBLEM. the shop sells ancient staffs < which i dont know how to take out… and the ancient staffs hit 99s!! how do i change the stat bonus on ancient staff?? what file do i look in ect… PLEASE HELP. I know where to look so you dont have to say oooh another noob who doesnt know ****. i just need to know where to look … some1 please help
